Title: Long Evening Dress with Beaded Top

Featured-image: CK58-black-long-evening-dress-with-beaded-top_p.jpg

----

Description: An open backed gown with a halter top is beaded in a style reminiscent of an Aztec design. The colorful beadwork covers the bodice and the A-line gown features a floor length skirt that has a sweeping train.
